name: Skronchulonch: The Game of Shooting at an Orb
name_original: Skronchulonch: The Game of Shooting at an Orb
description:
Skronchulonch: The Game of Shooting at an Orb is a game of momentum and gravity in the style of classic 1980's games such as Gravitar and Thrust, but designed to be much easier to play than its predecessors.

Assuming that you are using a QWERTY-US keyboard, hold Z to thrust, hold X to rewind time, press C to shoot, hold the left or right arrow key to turn, and press R to reset to the start of a level. If you are using another type of keyboard, the three important keys are the ones to the right of the left Shift key.
